alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 12:44PM MST until December 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the Tetons with 2 to 5 inches for the Gros Ventre Range. Higher amounts are expected across the Tetons. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, including over Teton Pass and Togwotee Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest periods of snow will be Sunday evening into Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
